name: Xbox 360
description: The Xbox 360 redefined gaming and entertainment with high-definition graphics and a massive library of games.
features: Backward compatibility with selected Xbox games

name: Xbox One
description: The Xbox One brings all your entertainment together in one place with stunning visuals and a powerful gaming experience.

name: Xbox Series X
description: The Xbox Series X is the fastest, most powerful Xbox ever, delivering sensationally smooth frame rates at up to 120FPS with the visual pop of HDR.
features: Backward compatibility for thousands of games

name: PlayStation 3
description: The PlayStation 3 offers high-definition gaming and entertainment, with exclusive titles and support for Blu-ray discs.
features: Exclusive games like Uncharted and God of War

name: PlayStation 4
description: The PlayStation 4 offers immersive gaming experiences, a powerful processor, and a range of exclusive titles.
features: PlayStation Plus membership for online gaming
Exclusive games like The Last of Us and Horizon Zero Dawn

name: PlayStation 4 Pro
description: The PlayStation 4 Pro delivers stunning 4K resolution and a host of upgrades for the ultimate gaming experience.

name: PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 brings next-gen gaming to life with a super-fast SSD, stunning graphics, and ultra-responsive controls.
features: Ultra-fast SSD for faster load times
Exclusive titles like Demon's Souls and Ratchet & Clank

name: PlayStation 5 Digital Edition
description: The PlayStation 5 Digital Edition offers all the next-gen features of the PS5, without the physical disc drive.
features: Exclusive games like Returnal and Spider-Man: Miles Morales

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch lets you play at home or on the go, with a hybrid design and a great library of games.
features: Exclusive titles like The Legend of Zelda and Super Mario

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: The Nintendo Switch OLED Model brings enhanced visuals with a vibrant OLED display and improved sound for portable gaming.

name: Nintendo Switch Lite
description: The Nintendo Switch Lite is a handheld-only version of the Nintendo Switch, designed for portable gaming.
